Professional Timeline

Citysocializer - Lead iOS Developer

1 Aug 2015 - Present (Almost 2.3 years)

Well, Working independently at Celerstudio has realize me that ideas, products, startups etc etc are good things but for monthly expenses parallelly you really need something which is profitable (product) or you are working for someone who is profitable(employer) and Yep luckily for that I’ve Citysocializer(my employer) subscription-based social networking website & app based in London where I’m working as Lead iOS Developer since Aug 2015 via remotely from India.

I’m really enjoying working for Citysocializer as part-time developer (yep working only 2 days in a week). Because of this, on remaining days, I’m easily focusing on my own product work under Celerstudio.

CelerStudio - Founder

1 Jan 2015 - Present (Almost 3 years)

From 1st of January 2015, I started working on CelerStudio products and Yep, there is no office for CelerStudio I am working from different different co-working spaces (The Playce, Workloft, Workamp, Of10) basically a startup campuses where entrepreneurs together building something for themselves.

Under CelerStudio I've finished few below listed products for iOS, Android and Web.

iOS (via me)

  • Wreely Actively working
  • RailEazy - Indian Railway(Rail) Timetable objective-c
  • Office In-Out objective-c
  • Currency Converter - Free and Quick Converter swift
  • SIP - Calculator
  • EMI Calculator for Home, Personal & Car Loan swift
  • Tip Calculator swift
  • Personal Media Vault objective-c

Web (via me)

  • Wreely Actively working
  • RailEazy - Indian Railway(Rail) Timetable

Android (via my android colleagues)

  • Wreely Actively working
  • RailEazy - Indian Railway(Rail) Timetable
  • Banklog
  • Cricket Live

Let’s see whether my decision will become right or wrong but whatever its all about experience and someone said "If you always make the right decision, the safe decision, the one most people make, you will be the same as everyone else."

CelerApps - Partner (Lead iOS Developer)

11 Mar 2014 - 31 Dec 2014 (10 month)

At CelerApps along with Redpanda Team with a lot of Karan support, I have learned a lot from him what exactly the entrepreneur means to me and I found that it's not as easy as I thought but remember "in life nothing is simple as simpler".

Remember for your survive and monthly expenses you have to do consulting, without consulting it's not possible to generate money except if you have some amazing product but currently, we don't have it.

The reason behind CelerApps that we guys who really want to build some product with earning capabilities along with consulting till date when we are capable of surviving through our product.

But building a good product it's not a simple thing but we tried along with our consulting work.

After few hard work, we build WhatScore(Watch score along with chat) an Extended Version of Cricket Live App and we failed but always remember "failure is a first step for success."

Now at CelerApps we are doing great with consulting work we build dozens of mobile apps for differents brands & together 40+ All over apps experience and everyone here handling his entrepreneurship role under Karan guideline.

What next for product.. yep we again trying our luck with one awesome idea and will always try our luck with dedicated hard work remember "Each mistake teaches you something new about yourself. There is no failure, remember, except in no longer trying. It is the courage to continue that counts."

P.S: I mentioned 11 March which is the start date of CelerApps because at that day http://celerapps.com site becomes live.

RedPanda Innovation Lab - Lead iOS Developer

Dec 2013 - Mar 2014 (4 month)

After spending almost 2 years at Indigo Consulting I thought let's do something different and then I joined Redpanda. The place where I found most intelligent people ever and still learning a lot every day.

But after a few month, I feel I want to do something with my own ideas like we did in indigo through unofficial CelerApps.Then Karan (Founder of Redpanda) suggested me lets start your own company under RedPanda Venture and do what you really want to do.

Then after a formal agreement with Karan I called Shivam(Android Developer) and Saya(Android Developer) from Indigo Consulting & they joined me along with Pooja as Windows Developer.

So we finally found CelerApps here at Redpanda as RedPanda Venture.

Indigo Consulting, A Leo Burnett Company - Sr. iOS Developer

Nov 2011 - Dec 2013 (Almost 2 year)

Worked on iOS based application for reputed brands like ICICI Bank, Asian Paints, and HSBC Amanah.

The place where we actually founded CelerApps with my friends (Shivam Singh and Saya Godshala), here we started thinking on our own ideas and we did.

Here we created Office In-Out, Cricket Live, Indian Railway, Media vault and BankLog like apps and remember this are all our own app and later officially labeled under CelerApps.

CloudGanga - iOS Developer

Apr 2011 - Nov 2011 (6 month)

Worked on so many iOS-based utility apps and also worked on PHP based site.

Here learned a lot about PHP and learned that PHP is a quick server side language which every mobile developer should know.

Magnanimous Software - iOS Developer

Nov 2010 - Apr 2011 (6 month)

Based on QT C++ experience I got selected here and this is the place where I learned HOW TO CODE in iOS and lots more.

Fortune Infocomm - QT C++ GUI Programmer

May 17 Nov 2010 - Nov 2010 (6 month)

On 15 May I submitted my last year project Black-Book and after one day of rest, I started working on fortune Infocomm from 17th May. Here I worked on different programming languages like QT, PHP and .NET but mostly worked on QT almost 4 & half month.

My fresh 6-month experience with almost no salary ;) but enjoyed a lot working on different technology and learned that "at career start don't bother about salary & all, just do what you really want to do and love."
